variables.name: fabric_environment
variables.note: The environment name (e.g., development, production). Must match your platform_manifest_[environment].yml file name.

variables.name: fabric_deployment_workspace_id
variables.note: The GUID of the Fabric workspace where this solution will be deployed.

variables.name: config_workspace_name
variables.note: Name of the workspace containing the configuration lakehouse.

variables.name: config_workspace_id
variables.note: GUID of the workspace containing the configuration lakehouse.

variables.name: config_wh_workspace_id
variables.note: GUID of the workspace containing the configuration warehouse.

variables.name: config_lakehouse_name
variables.note: Name of the lakehouse used for configuration tables.

variables.name: config_lakehouse_id
variables.note: GUID of the lakehouse used for configuration tables.

variables.name: config_wh_warehouse_name
variables.note: Name of the warehouse used for configuration tables.

variables.name: config_wh_warehouse_id
variables.note: GUID of the warehouse used for configuration tables.

variables.name: sample_lh_lakehouse_name
variables.note: Name of your sample/main lakehouse for data tables.

variables.name: sample_lh_workspace_id
variables.note: GUID of your sample/main lakehouse workspace.

variables.name: sample_lh_lakehouse_id
variables.note: GUID of your sample/main lakehouse for data tables.

variables.name: sample_wh_workspace_id
variables.note: Optional: GUID of your warehouse (if using SQL analytics).

variables.name: sample_wh_warehouse_name
variables.note: Optional: Name of your warehouse (if using SQL analytics).

variables.name: sample_wh_warehouse_id
variables.note: Optional: GUID of your warehouse (if using SQL analytics).

variables.name: raw_lh_workspace_id
variables.note: GUID of the workspace containing raw/staging lakehouse.

variables.name: raw_lh_lakehouse_name
variables.note: Name of the raw/staging lakehouse.

variables.name: raw_lh_lakehouse_id
variables.note: GUID of the raw/staging lakehouse.

variables.name: raw_wh_workspace_id
variables.note: GUID of the workspace containing raw/staging warehouse.

variables.name: raw_wh_warehouse_id
variables.note: GUID of the raw/staging warehouse.

variables.name: edw_workspace_id
variables.note: GUID of the Enterprise Data Warehouse (EDW) workspace.

variables.name: edw_lakehouse_name
variables.note: Name of the EDW lakehouse.

variables.name: edw_lakehouse_id
variables.note: GUID of the EDW lakehouse.

variables.name: edw_warehouse_name
variables.note: Name of the EDW warehouse.

variables.name: edw_warehouse_id
variables.note: GUID of the EDW warehouse.
